channel.title: The 2011 Mopar Game Dev Christmas challenge
channel.description:
David and I collaborated to create a Christmas-oriented programming challenge for the members of this site. The winners will receive a contest winner badge until the next contest, and be added to a hall of fame. Overall, we're just looking to add some more activity to this site, and have fun while doing it! :)
Head over to the [url=http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,526995.0.html]official rules topic[/url] for more information.
